timeline.message: Model property naming style generic for scala
scala templates based on abstractScala regererated

timeline.bodyText: Would it be an issue if formatIdentifier is no longer used in toVarName?
timeline.author: wing328

replies.bodyText:
As of this change it is not backward compatible to akka-http, as formatIdentifier and toVarName has some difference when original name in UPPERCASE.
uPPERCASE for formatIdentifier
UPPERCASE for toVarName (do not apply naming rules for uppercase names)
I've added some tests to cover those cases.
I could revert formatIdentifier for default camelCase to make it backward compatible for 4.3.0 release, should I?
replies.author: chameleon82
chameleon82

replies.bodyText: As discussed let's consider this as a bug fix as it's fixing the inconsistent variable naming in different Scala generators.
replies.author: wing328
